about.title: Welcome
about.subtitle: Service for Ukrainians in Europe
about.part_1: We are Ukrainians who found a new home in the Netherlands because of the war. We left everything behind, but brought with us an indomitable spirit, culture and desire to build a new life.
about.part_2: Each of us is a story. A story about finding a job, adapting children to new schools, learning a language, and incredible gratitude. We thank the Netherlands, Germany and all of Europe for their open hearts and doors.
about.part_3: This platform is created to support each other, share experiences, offer your services and find what you need in our community.
about.alt: The Ukrainian community in the Netherlands

hero.Ukrainians and friends in the Netherland: Ukrainians and friends in the Netherlands
hero.moto: Let's unite We are working. We create the future together.

callToAction.Offer: Do you offer services, sell goods or organize events? Tell our community about yourself.

legalStatus.lows: Understanding your legal status is key to your stability. Most Ukrainians in the EU, including the Netherlands, are under the Temporary Protection Directive (RTB in the Netherlands).
